name: Reficul VR
description: Designed Exclusively for VR, Reficul is a rogue-like open world survival horror game with a Hell of an atmosphere. Features realistic weapon handling, magical relics, and a unique enemy. Reficul is a scary apocalyptic survival horror game which will challenge your survival skills in every way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 10 Processor: i5/ i7 or similar AMD (4th gen Min) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 10 Series Nvidia card (Min 1060) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 13 GB available space Additional Notes: Virtual Reality & Motion Controller Only!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Haswell/Skylake or later Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: 10 Series Nvidia Card (1070/1080) recommended! DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 15 GB available space Additional Notes: Virtual Reality & Motion Controller Only!
